register.description: The register configures the base address of the video buffer for video window #n(#j for ping-pong mechanism with external trigger, based on the field polarity: 0 for even field and 1 for odd field).Shadow register, updated on VFP start period or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Video base addressBase address of the video buffer (aligned on pixel size boundary)

register.description: The register configures the base address of the video buffer for video window #n(#j for ping-pong mechanism with external trigger, based on the field polarity: 0 for even field and 1 for odd field).Shadow register, updated on VFP start period or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Video base addressBase address of the video buffer (aligned on pixel size boundary)

register.description: The register configures the position of video window #n.Shadow register, updated on VFP start period or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility.Read returns 0
Y position of video window #nEncoded value (from 0 to 2047) to specify the Y position of video window #n. The line at the top has the Y-position 0.
Write 0s for future compatibility.Read returns 0
X position of video window #nEncoded value (from 0 to 2047) to specify the X position of video window #n. The first pixel on the left of the display screen has the X-position 0.

register.description: The register configures the size of video window #n.Shadow register, updated on VFP start period or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility.Read returns 0
Number of lines of video #nEncoded value (from 1 to 2048) to specify the number of lines of video window #n (program to value minus one).
Write 0s for future compatibility.Read returns 0
Number of pixels of video window #nEncoded value (from 1 to 2048) to specify the number of pixels of video window #n (program to value minus one).

register.description: The register configures the attributes of video window #n such as format, resizeenable, shadow register, updated on VFP start period, or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.

The field configures the DISPC VID2 to process incoming data as pre-multiplied alpha data or non pre-multiplied alpha data.Default setting is non pre-multiplied alpha data.0x0: Non pre-multiplyalpha data color component 0x1: Premultiplyalpha data color component
Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Enables the self refresh of the video window from its own FIFO only.

bitenum.description: The video pipeline accesses the interconnect to fetch data from the system memory
The video pipeline does not need anymore to fetch data from memory. Only the video FIFO is used. It takes effect after the frame has been loaded in the FIFO

bitfield.description: Determines the priority of the video pipeline. The video pipeline is one of the high priority pipeline. The arbitration wheel gives always the priority first to the high priority pipelines using round-robin between them. When there is only normal priority pipelines sending requests, the round-robin applies between them.

bitenum.description: The video pipeline is one of the normal priority pipeline.
The video pipeline is one of the high priority pipeline.

bitfield.description: Video vertical line buffer split

bitenum.description: Vertical line buffers are not split.
Vertical line buffers are split into two.

bitfield.description: Video vertical resize tap number

bitenum.description: Three taps are used for the vertical filtering logic. The other two taps are not used.
Five taps are used for the vertical filtering logic.

bitfield.description: Video optimization in case ofEven width is required for the input picture when 5 taps are used. .

bitenum.description: The DMA engine fetches one pixel for each 32-bit OCP request (RGB16 and YUV422) while doing 90- and 270-degree rotation (accessing on-chip memory and off-chip memory).

The DMA engine fetches two pixels for each 32-bit OCP request (RGB16 and YUV422) while doing 90- and 270-degree rotation (accessing on-chip memory and off-chip memory).The bit field [21] VIDVERTICALTAPS shall be set to 0x1, bit field [22] VIDLINEBUFFERSPLIT to 0x1, and all scaler registers shall be configured even for 1:1 ratio.

bitfield.description: Video preload value

bitenum.description: H/W prefetches pixels up to the preload value defined in the preload register.
H/W prefetches pixels up to the high threshold value.

bitfield.description: Video Row Repeat (YUV case only when rotating 90 or 270-degree)

bitenum.description: Row of VIDn won't be read twice.
The Row data are fetched twice to extract both the Y components

bitfield.description: Video Endianness
Video Channel Out configurationwr: Immediate
Video DMA Burst Size
Video Rotation Flag

bitenum.description: No rotation or VidFormat is RGB
Limited range selected: 16 subtracted from Y before color space conversion
Full range selected: Y is not modified before the color space conversion
Disable Color Space Conversion CbYCr to RGB
Enable Color Space Conversion CbYCr to RGB

bitfield.description: Video Vertical Resize Configuration
Video Horizontal Resize Configuration
Video Resize Enable

bitenum.description: Enable both horizontal and vertical resize processing

bitfield.description: Video1 channel Format; Other enums: Reserved (all other values between 0x0 and0x3,0x5, 0x7, and between 0xC and 0xF)VIDFORMAT(Video 2 channel) Video2 channel Format; Other enums: Reserved (all other values: 0x0 and0x3, 0x7, and 0xF) RW 0x0 .

bitenum.description: RGBx 32 (24-bit RGB aligned on MSB of the 32-bit container)
Video disabled (video pipeline inactive and window not present)
Video enabled (video pipeline active and window present on the screen)

register.description: The register configures the video FIFO associated with video pipeline #n.Shadow register, updated on VFP start period or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Video FIFO high thresholdNumber of bytes defining the threshold value
Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Video FIFO low thresholdNumber of bytes defining the threshold value

register.description: The register defines the video FIFO size for video pipeline #n.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Video FIFO SizeNumber of bytes defining the FIFO value

register.description: The register configures the number of bytes to increment at the end of the row for the buffer associated with video window #n.Shadow register, updated on VFP start period or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Number of bytes to increment at the end of the rowEncoded signed value (from -2- 1 to 2) to specify the number of bytes to increment at the end of the row in the video buffer.The value 0 is invalid. The value 1 means next pixel. The value 1+n*BPP means increment of n pixels. The value 1- (n+1)*BPP means decrement of n pixels.

register.description: The register configures the number of bytes to increment between two pixels for the buffer associated with video window #n.Shadow register, updated on VFP start period or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility.Read returns 0

Number of bytes to increment at the end of the rowEncoded signed value (from -2- 1 to 2) to specify the number of bytes between two pixels in the video buffer.The value 0 is invalid. The value 1 means next pixel. The value 1+n*BPP means increment of n pixels. The value 1- (n+1)*BPP means decrement of n pixels

register.description: The register configures the resize factors for horizontal and vertical up-/down-sampling of video window #n.Shadow register, updated on VFP start period or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Vertical increment of the up/down-sampling filterEncoded value (from 1 to 4096). The value 0 is invalid. Values greater than 4096 are invalid.
Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Horizontal increment of the up/down-sampling filterEncoded value (from 1 to 4096). The value 0 is invalid. Values greater than 4096 are invalid.

register.description: The register configures the size of the video picture associated with video layer #nbefore up-/down-scaling.Shadow register, updated on VFP start period or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility.Read returns 0
Number of lines of the video pictureEncoded value (from 1 to 2048) to specify the number of lines of the video picture in memory (program to value minus one).
Write 0s for future compatibility.Read returns 0

Number of pixels of the video pictureEncoded value (from 1 to 2048) to specify the number of pixels of the video picture in memory (program to value minus one). The size is limited to the size of the line buffer of the vertical sampling block in case the video picture is processed by the vertical filtering unit.

register.description: The register configures the resize accumulator init values for horizontal and vertical up-/down-sampling of video window #n (#I for ping-pong mechanism with external trigger, based on the field polarity)Shadow register, updated on VFP start period or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility.Read returns 0
Vertical initialization accu value. Encoded value (from 0 to 1023).
Write 0s for future compatibility.Read returns 0
Horizontal initialization accu value. Encoded value (from 0 to 1023).

register.description: The register configures the resize accumulator init values for horizontal and vertical up-/down-sampling of video window #n (#I for ping-pong mechanism with external trigger, based on the field polarity)Shadow register, updated on VFP start period or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility.Read returns 0
Vertical initialization accu value. Encoded value (from 0 to 1023).
Write 0s for future compatibility.Read returns 0
Horizontal initialization accu value. Encoded value (from 0 to 1023).

register.description: The bank of registers configure the up-/down-scaling coefficients for the vertical and horizontal resize of the video picture associated with video window #n for the phases from 0 to 7.Shadow register, updated on VFP start period or EVSYNC.

bitfield.description: Signed coefficient C3 for the horizontal up/down-scaling with the phase n
Unsigned coefficient C2 for the horizontal up/down-scaling with the phase n
Signed coefficient C1 for the horizontal up/down-scaling with the phase n
Signed coefficient C0 for the horizontal up/down-scaling with the phase n
